result.title: Propagation of wild olives. A detailed document on vegetative and seed propagation of wild olive genotypes. Building of the WOKE network.
result.description: D.2.3. Propagation of wild olives. A detailed document on vegetative and seed propagation of wild olive genotypes. Building of the WOKE network (M: 23; ORDP; PU).This deliverabl encompasses the actions and work described in T2.3: . Establishment of reference wild olive germplasm banks, with replicates in field collections in each GEN4OLIVE participant country (Wild Olive Knowledge Enterprise, WOKE).

result.title: GEN4OLIVE Stablish links activities Plan.
result.description: D.1.1. GEN4OLIVE Stablish links Activities Plan. (M: 10; R; CO).Within this deliverable, ORI in collaboration with the rest of consortium will establish links with the future and ongoing projects (already identified or to be identify) for sharing knowledge and optimizing use of resources.We will contact and propose feedback strategies to the leaders of these projects in order to self-benefit and maximize the work achieved so far.This deliverabl encompasses the tasks described in T1.6.

result.title: Intermediate report about the olive varieties resilience to adverse environmental conditions.
result.description: D.3.1. Intermediate report about the olive varieties resilience to adverse environmental conditions (Month:28; Type: R; Dissemination Level: PU).This deliverable will reflect the preliminary work done in T3.1: Evaluation of olive tolerance to adverse environmental conditions. We will submit the results about the chilling requirements, drought tolerance and frost tolerance of olive varieties.

result.title: Report on results of GEN4OLIVE calls for proposals. Description of the call approach, schedule, evaluation process, results of the call (number of submitted, number of funded SMs, countries) and lessons learnt.
result.description: D7.3 - Report on results of GEN4OLIVE calls for proposals. Description of the call approach, schedule, evaluation process, results of the call (number of submitted, number of funded SMEs, countries) and lessons learnt. (Month: 36; Type: ORDP; Dissemination Level: PU).Within this deliverable will be reflected the results of work and actions forseen in T7.3, T7.4 and T7.5.

result.title: Preliminary classification of olive varieties according to their production and quality.
result.description: D.3.3. Preliminary classification of olive varieties according to their production and quality (M: 30; R; PU).This deliverable will reflect the preliminary results obtained in T3.5 and T3.6:-Determination of valuable production traits (fruits and oil) in olive varieties. -Determination of olive oil chemical composition (fatty acid and phenolic compounds).

result.title: Bundle of digital twin tools for net zero decision-making 1
result.description: First version of Digital Energy Twin resources responding to the implementation roadmaps of all pilot cities.Bundle of digital twin tools adapting existing Digital Twins of urban environments, describing the pilot environments at the necessary built and natural environment spatial and temporal resolution, as well as incorporating user behaviour characteristics, including BIM and CIM energy integration models for net zero decision-making. First version.
